desc.en: The Doha Metro is an urban rail transit system in the capital city of Qatar, Doha. It is mainly built to support the 2022 World Cup. The first line (red line) was opened for operation in May 2019, followed by the addition of yellow and green lines. The system includes three unmanned driving routes with a total length of about 80 kilometers, covering 37 stations, connecting core areas such as Hamad International Airport and Lusail New City .
desc.zh: 多哈地铁是卡塔尔首都多哈的城市轨道交通系统，主要为2022年世界杯赛事配套建设，首条线路（红线）于2019年5月开通运营，后续新增黄线、绿线 。该系统包含三条无人驾驶线路，总长约80公里，覆盖37个站点，连接哈马德国际机场、卢赛尔新城等核心区域 。
